biotools.summary: Heu-MCHC is a fast and accurate heuristic for the Minimum-Change Haplotype Configuration (MCHC) problem, i.e. a combinatorial formulation of the haplotype inference problem on pedigree data where the total number of recombinations and point mutations has to be minimized.

bioschemas.name: Heu-MCHC
bioschemas.summary: Heu-MCHC is a fast and accurate heuristic for the Minimum-Change Haplotype Configuration (MCHC) problem, i.e. a combinatorial formulation of the haplotype inference problem on pedigree data where the total number of recombinations and point mutations has to be minimized.
